description: Decimal expansion of sqrt(3) truncated to n places.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: With[{sqrt3 = RealDigits[Sqrt[3], 10, 50][[1]]}, Table[FromDigits[Take[ sqrt3, n]], {n, 20}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 04 2011 *)IntegerPart[Table[N[Sqrt[3], k]*10^(k - 1), {k, 17}]] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Aug 15 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
